contentArea.content:
* Sono DNA reborn with the Finnish forrest.
* World Biggest Wooden Hotel in Wonsando
* With the construction of Korea ÃÅs first high-rise wooden hotel, it is an urban hotel where residents of the Boryeong area gather and experience the best of nature and the city in Wonsando.

brandStory.heading: Nordic Expression of Sono DNA : Water experience

contentArea.content: Enjoy seasonal activities (water park, golf, ski)

* Nordic Wellness with Local Context
* Luxurious Spa for the entire family
* Entertainment, food and beverage facilities are composed of Nordic hospitality and wellness programs unique to the Boryeong region.

images.caption: hill garden
images.title: take a breathe in hill garden

images.caption: puro spa
images.title: premium spa experiences in puro spa

images.caption: sono felice
images.title: The private atrium
images.desc:
The atrium is the heart of the suite and creates the welcoming and unique ambience to the space.

Located in the central place of the suite with a bath and a fireplace the atrium is your internal hub to be enjoyed throughout your stay.

The flowing floor plan opens views from one space to another unhindered and the atrium sets the mood for  the spatial experience from the first point of arrival.

Glowing lighting around the fire pit makes it the central focus point even when the fire has not been lit.c

The dark and moody interior creates an inviting space in terms of contemporary luxury.

images.caption: sono felice penthouse
images.title: place for serenity
images.desc:
Located in the highest floors of the hotel, the Penthouse Suites offer privacy and a sense of luxury in a classic yet contemporary style.

An elegant and architecturally well designed space introduces guests to forget everyday life and step into a state of serenity.

The dark and moody interior is inviting with streamlined  bespoke furniture solutions that creates tranquility in the dark and an atmospheric interior.

Dark wood offers a rich palette and feels reassuringly solid reinforcing the feeling of quality. Natural light is invited in during the day whilst the warm glow of mood lighting sets the ambience by night.

images.caption: sono felice penthouse
images.title: seamless connection
images.subTitle: The terrace serves as a sophisticated yet laid back extended living room during the warm season.
images.desc: Spatial solutions of the terrace serve many purposes. The terrace offers a private space to unwind with family and friends from early morning to night. Enjoy coffee while admiring the sunrise and cocktails in the cooling evening around the fire pit. Have a dip or exercise in your private pool and enjoy an  open sky dinner in your exclusive private retreat with family and friends.

images.caption: sono felice penthouse
images.title: modern terrace with premium quality
images.subTitle: High-End modern terrace
images.desc:
Uniform flooring look and feel highlights the seamless connection between indoor & outdoor spaces and lets the view stand in the spotlight.

Material palette with dark gray limestone, dark wood and matt black metal details continue from interior to exterior.

The natural material palette provide Strong sense of tactility.

images.caption: sono felice penthouse
images.title: a place to unwind in privacy
images.desc:
The dark mood of the interior continues to the balcony. The ambience of the private balcony asks to relax in style.

15 m2 balcony shares offers a space to unwind from early morning to late night. Enjoy coffee while admiring the sunrise, sunbathing in the noon and cocktails in the cooling evening.

Lightweight furniture are easy to move to follow the sun, the shadow, the sunrise or sunset according to each guests desires.

images.caption: sono felice penthouse
images.title: a place to unwind in privacy

images.caption: coastal suite
images.title: A Place for Silent Luxury
images.desc:
Located by the sea with four floors and stunning ocean views, the Costal Suites offer the most distinctive sense of luxury. Here you can feel the beauty of living connected to the Ocean.

The biophilic interior is created with natural materials. Surrounded by dark toned wood and natural stone, guests can easily settle into a serene spirit.

The minimalistic & streamlined style serves the same purpose. When visual stimulus is reduced to a minimum, guests can experience the meditative impact of the space. The streamlined bespoke solutions and integrated furniture highlight the sense of luxury.

The view stands in a focus point whether it is experienced from indoor spaces or from the two private terraces.

In the daytime the suite offers privacy whilst sun bathing. At night, the space becomes even more private in the dim golden glow of the lighting.

images.caption: coastal suite
images.title: terrace
images.desc:
Terrace is your private retreat, a place to unwind in privacy.

Minimalistic surroundings let eye focus on the landscape, the ever-changing Ocean.

The dark wood theme continues from interior to exterior in furniture.

Loose, light weight lounge chairs & occasional tables  support many purposes: To follow the sun, to enjoy refreshments in the shaddow and admire sunrise and sunset from the perfect spot.

images.caption: sono calm
images.title: framed view
images.desc:
Imagine the comfort of being able to relax in a sophisticated ambience  with the sunlight filtering through whilst gazing out at a remarkable view.

A key feature in the Sono Calm rooms is the window that frames the view with the integrated daybed.

The view from the floor-to-ceiling windows opens also from the floating second floor.

Interior solutions in Sono Calm encourage the laidback and natural lifestyle in style. The connection to the nature can be experienced in the natural material palette, rich in texture  yet sophisticated biophilic interior.

images.caption: sono calm
images.title: wood
images.desc:
Wood is a living material. It grows, develops character. Each ring is a unique imprint of time and tells a story. Wood brings us closer to nature. Wood naturally optimises the air quality and regulated moisture. It absorbs noise. Wood has an effect on you, it calms you down.

Oak is reassuring, timeless and showcases craftsmanship details.

Natural oak to dominate living room interior with wide planks for a calming feel, that flow towards the window.

To create zones within a level flooring, use compact narrow wooden slats for the bathing zone reminiscent of sauna and spa spaces.

images.caption: sono calm
images.title: Balcony - A place to unwind & enjoy the view
images.desc:
Light & warm ambience of the private balcony asks to relax in the open air.

The balcony offers a space to unwind from early morning to late night. Enjoy coffee while admiring the surise, sunbathing in the noon and coctails in the cooling evening.

Lightweight furniture are easy to move to follow the sun, the shadow, the sunrise or sunset according to each guests desires.

images.caption: sono calm penthouse
images.title: Tranquil heaven
images.desc:
The Penthouse suites offer privacy and sense of luxury combined with strong sense of being connected to the nature.

With an airy look and feel, stunning views and a great amount of natural daylight guests can relax and even feel like they are blending into the surroundings.

Elegant and architecturally well designed space serves as a calming private heaven. Here in the biophilic interior created with rich natural material palette, guests can escape everyday life.

images.caption: sono calm penthouse
images.title: Terrace
images.subTitle: CHERISHING THE CONNECTION TO THE NATURE
images.desc:
The interior solutions in Sono Calm encourage a relaxed and natural lifestyle. Highlighting these values indoor space experience continues seamless to the terrace in Sono Calm Penthouse Suites.

The terrace serves as a laid back extended living room during the warm season.

Spatial solutions of the terrace serve many purposes. Terrace offers a special place to unwind with family and friends from early morning to late night. Enjoy coffee while admiring the sunrise, swimming in the private pool in the sun, cocktails in the cooling evening around the fire pit and open sky dinner with family and friends.

The seamless connection between indoor & outdoor spaces sets the view to spotlight all year round cherishing the connection to the Nature.

images.caption: sono calm penthouse
images.title: Private Infinity Pool A place to unwind & enjoy the view
